channel.title: Comments on: Arrived and it’s hot… damn hot.

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>Happy birthday, brother!! What are the plans for your day? Perhaps some loitering outside 1600? Whatever you do, have a top day Matthew - glad to hear that the wether is mighty fine. All our love, Si & Fi</p>
item.content:encoded: Happy birthday, brother!! What are the plans for your day? Perhaps some loitering outside 1600? Whatever you do, have a top day Matthew – glad to hear that the wether is mighty fine. All our love, Si & Fi
